FIGREF1.text: first row and replaced by medium containing the highest dilution of compound; serial drug dilutions were prepared covering a range from 90-0.123 g/ml. The plates were incubated for another 72 h. 10 L of Alamar Blue (12.5 mg resazurin dissolved in 100 mL H 2 O) were then added to each well and incubation continued for a further 1-4 h. The plates were read with a Spectramax Gemini XS microplate fluorometer (Molecular Devices Cooperation, Sunnyvale, CA, USA) using an excitation wavelength of 530 nm and an emission wavelength of 590 nm.
